name: @chialab/synapse
description: Application framework built on the top of DNA Web Components.

scripts.build: npm run types && rimraf dist && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:node
scripts.build:esm: rimraf dist/esm && rna build src/index.ts --output dist/esm/synapse.js --format esm --minify --platform browser
scripts.build:node: rimraf dist/node && rna build src/index.ts --output dist/node/synapse.js --format esm --minify --platform node
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist/cjs && rna build src/index.ts --output dist/cjs/synapse.cjs --format cjs --minify --platform node

author: Chialab <dev@chialab.io> (https://www.chialab.it)
